markdownRemark.html:
About

Ngành Thiếu Nhi (the Search Division)’s motto is “Hy Sinh!”, meaning “sacrifice”. This division wears blue scarves, representing vitality as vast as the blue sky and as robust as the wide ocean and a great hope for the future. This division consists of members from ages 10 to 12 years old who comprise three levels: Levels 1, 2, and 3.
